title: BitLocker Recovery & Encryption Issues
description: Assistance with BitLocker recovery keys and drive encryption.

steps.title: Restart System
steps.instruction: Sometimes a simple restart resolves temporary TPM recognition issues. Restart your computer and see if it boots normally.

steps.title: Remove External Devices
steps.instruction: Unplug all USB drives, docking stations, and peripherals. Restart the computer again. External devices can sometimes change the boot order.

steps.title: Locate Recovery Key
steps.instruction: If asked for a key, check your dedicated BitLocker portal (if available) or your Microsoft Account at https://account.microsoft.com/devices/recoverykey.

steps.title: BIOS/TPM Check
steps.instruction: If you recently updated BIOS, ensure TPM is enabled in BIOS settings. (Only for advanced users).

steps.title: Ticket Preparation
steps.instruction: If you cannot find your key or the drive remains locked, raise a ticket with: Asset ID, Computer Name, and screen photo of the BitLocker prompt.
